text: Mark Neveldine and Brian Taylor, are two American filmmakers who collectively in collaboration as a filmmaking duo are sometimes referred to as Neveldine & Taylor or Neveldine/Taylor. Their written and directed productions are known for being dark, edgy and over the top, while maintaining a small budget. Both Neveldine and Taylor have written and directed several films together that include Crank, and its sequel, Crank: High Voltage.
